alert.note: Alert for McHenry; Pierce (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued October 30 at 3:28PM CDT until October 30 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Pierce County in north central North Dakota... East central McHenry County in north central North Dakota... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Barton City to near Rugby to 14 miles west of Leeds, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions with near zero visibility associated with intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Travelers along Highway 2 will be impacted. Be ready for a rapid change in visibility. Locations impacted include... Rugby, Balta, Barton, Barton City, Berwick, Silva, and Orrin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED
